articles.title: Sexual abuse: R Kelly bags additional 20 years jail term - Daily Post Nigeria
articles.description: Former American recording artiste Robert Sylvester Kelly, professionally known as R. Kelly, has been sentenced to an additional 20 years imprisonment. The United State District Judge Harry D. Leinenweber sentenced the 56-year-old to 20 years in jail on Thursd…
articles.content:

articles.title: US reiterates China considering sending Russia military help for Ukraine war - South China Morning Post
articles.description: No sign Moscow-targeted sanctions being evaded, but strong indications recently that Beijing is pondering option, says America’s top diplomat.
